title: 4 bedroom mews property for rent
description: Nestled on the prestigious Wimpole Street, just a stone's throw from the vibrant Oxford Street, this fully refurbished three-storey mews house presents a rare blend of sophistication, comfort, and contemporary design. Featuring four spacious bedrooms, the property has been finished to an exceptional standard throughout, offering a welcoming and stylish home ideal for long-term living in the heart of London. <PARA> The first floor boasts a bright, open-plan layout where natural light floods in through full-height windows. The living area is thoughtfully arranged, flowing seamlessly from a sleek, modern lounge into an elegant dining space and bespoke kitchen. Wooden floors run throughout, adding warmth and character. The furnishings are tastefully curated, with soft neutral sofas and rich velvet armchairs that bring both style and comfort. A custom-designed glass and wood divider enhances the architectural depth, balancing openness with subtle separation. <PARA> No detail has been overlooked. From the use of premium materials to refined finishes, every element has been carefully considered to create a harmonious and relaxed living environment-perfect for modern city life. <PARA> The kitchen is both stunning and highly functional. Finished with light grey cabinetry and topped with striking marble, it features top-of-the-line integrated appliances and a clean, sophisticated aesthetic. The adjoining dining area, complete with plush velvet seating, provides an inviting space for entertaining. A built-in fridge and ambient lighting complete the space, ensuring it is as practical as it is luxurious. <PARA> The ground floor includes two beautifully appointed bedrooms offering generous built-in storage and a tranquil atmosphere. This level also features a luxurious all-marble bathroom and a convenient guest WC. <PARA> On the lower ground floor, the master suite and an additional en-suite bedroom offer a serene retreat, each with a beautifully finished marble bathroom. Designed for comfort and calm, all bedrooms feature soft textures, neutral tones, and plush bedding to create a restful ambiance. Built-in wardrobes ensure ample storage while maintaining a clean, minimalist look. Parquet flooring flows throughout, enhancing the natural warmth and cohesion of the home. <PARA> This exceptional property captures the essence of central London elegance. Just moments from Oxford Street, Marylebone High Street, and Regent's Park-with excellent transport links via Bond Street and Oxford Circus Underground stations-it offers a rare opportunity to secure a luxurious, turnkey residence in one of the capital's most desirable addresses.
